document.full_text: the cannes film festival stumbled toward its close on friday, still reeling from the shock expulsion of danish director lars von trier which has overshadowed an otherwise impressive year for movies and stars.
document.title: director's shame casts pall over classy cannes
lines_and_colors: the cannes film festival stumbled toward its close on friday, still reeling from the shock expulsion of danish director lars von trier which has overshadowed an otherwise impressive year for movies and stars.
